body_content.explanation: an official request for something, usually in writing:
examples: Free information will be sent out on application to (= if you ask) the central office.
I've sent off applications for four different jobs.
Have you filled in the application form for your passport yet?
Argentina has submitted an application to host the World Cup.

body_content.explanation: a computer program that is designed for a particular purpose:
a way in which something can be used for a particular purpose:
examples: the application of this research in the treatment of cancer

body_content.explanation: the determination to work hard over a period of time in order to succeed at something:
examples: Joshua clearly has ability in this subject but lacks application.

body_content.explanation: the act of spreading or rubbing a substance such as cream or paint on a surface, or a layer of cream or paint:
examples: Leave the paint to dry between applications.
Regular application of the cream should reduce swelling within 24 hours.

body_content.explanation: a way in which a rule or law, etc. relates to or is important for someone or something:
examples: The new laws have (a) particular application to the self-employed.
